required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: National Survey on Hypertension in General Practitioner (GP) Consultation
clinical_study.official_title: Profile of Hypertensive Patients Seen in General Practitioner Consultation

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate (with sufficient accuracy) the profile(demographic and clinical characteristics, health care management) of hypertensive patients seen in general practitioner consultation.

primary_outcome.measure: Demographic, clinical and health care characteristics

study_pop.textblock: First three consecutive patients with hypertension seen by general practitioner

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- male or female > or = 18 years old
- Known hypertension
- agree to take part in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
